participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and enthusiastic, Emma loves to connect with people and spread joy through her work.
participant_1.background: I have light brown hair that I usually wear in a ponytail. My parents are loving and supportive, even if they don't always understand my choices. I love to take road trips. I am a freelancer because I can choose my own hours and work from anywhere. I am good at throwing parties.

participant_2.name: William
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, William enjoys expressing himself through art and values unique experiences.
participant_2.background: My beard is a part of my personality, and I love antiques. I hide my drawings of ponies from my parents because I am afraid they will think they are childish. I have an eyebrow piercing. I'm a cat person. I value my Louis Vuittons the most because they're a symbol of my success and status.

content.text: I'm William, nice to meet you!
Hi William, I'm (participant_1). What do you do for work?
I'm a freelancer, I love the flexibility of working from anywhere.
That's really cool! I'm a freelancer too, I love having the freedom to choose my own hours.
What kind of work do you do?
I'm a party planner, I love throwing parties and making people happy.
That sounds like a really fun job!
It is, I love it! What kind of things do you like to do for fun?
I love to take road trips, I love seeing new places and meeting new people.
That's awesome! I love road trips too. I love the feeling of freedom and adventure.
I know right? It's so much fun to just get in the car and drive to wherever you want.
Have you ever been on a road trip to a national park?
No, I haven't actually, but I've always wanted to go.
They're so beautiful, I highly recommend it.
I'll have to put that on my list of things to do!
